info.name: Battlefield Simple Login - My Little Ponies
info.description: I made my previous Battlefield login with everyone in mind but this one is for those who want to bronify their battlelog! Any requests for any other themes? Suggestions? Comment!
info.additionalInfo:
0.2 Huge update coming soon! Ability to have your favorite MLP character in place of where the BF dude would normally be!
0.1 Release
